pages.privacy-policy: Petal Paradise - Custom Floral Arrangements and Unique Bouquets +91-972248-5512 petalparadise@gmail.com Mahuli Jahagir, Maharashtra 444901 Petal Paradise HOME ABOUT US CATALOG Petal Paradise +91-972248-5512 petalparadise@gmail.com Mahuli Jahagir, Maharashtra 444901 HOME ABOUT US CATALOG SALE 10% SALE 10% SALE 10% SALE 10% PRIVACY POLICY Welcome to Petal Paradise. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you. We may collect, use, store, and transfer different kinds of personal data about you, including: identity Data, contact Data, transaction Data, technical Data, profile Data, usage Data, marketing and communications Data We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances: To process and deliver your order To manage your account To notify you about changes to our services To improve our website and services To send you marketing communications We do not share your personal data with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. This may include sharing your data with: Service providers who provide IT and system administration services Professional advisers including lawyers, bankers, auditors, and insurers Government bodies that require us to report processing activities We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered, or disclosed. Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to: Request access to your personal data Request correction of your personal data Request erasure of your personal data Object to processing of your personal data Request restriction of processing your personal data Request transfer of your personal data Withdraw consent Contact Us: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at: petalparadise@gmail.com Petal Paradise HOME ABOUT US CATALOG Privacy Policy | Terms and Conditions +91-972248-5512 petalparadise@gmail.com Mahuli Jahagir, Maharashtra 444901

pages.about: Petal Paradise - Premium Flowers for Every Occasion +91-972248-5512 petalparadise@gmail.com Mahuli Jahagir, Maharashtra 444901 Petal Paradise HOME ABOUT US CATALOG Petal Paradise +91-972248-5512 petalparadise@gmail.com Mahuli Jahagir, Maharashtra 444901 HOME ABOUT US CATALOG SALE 10% SALE 10% SALE 10% SALE 10% Petal Paradise: An oasis of beauty and tenderness in the world of flowers Welcome to Petal Paradise, your source of inspiration and joy in the world of flowers. We offer you the widest selection of exquisite bouquets, fresh plants and original compositions, created with love and professionalism by our florists. In Petal Paradise, every flower becomes part of a magical world filled with beauty and tenderness. Enjoy the beauty of nature in every bouquet with Petal Paradise. NO.1 ORIGINAL FLOWER STORE Since 2016 we have been delivering across Nation wide with the freshest most beautiful flowers. Impeccable flowers at great prices and delivered quickly. CATALOG Our Advantages Fresh Flowers We offer a wide selection of fresh and high-quality flowers sourced from trusted growers. Fast Delivery Enjoy fast and reliable flower delivery services to bring smiles to your loved ones. Customization Options Personalize your bouquet with our customization options to make it truly unique. Excellent Customer Support Our dedicated customer support team is here to assist you every step of the way. Our Values Commitment to Quality We are dedicated to providing the highest quality flowers sourced from trusted growers. Each bloom is carefully selected to ensure freshness and beauty. Customer Satisfaction Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We strive to exceed their expectations with personalized service and exquisite floral arrangements. Creativity and Innovation We embrace creativity and constantly innovate to offer unique and stunning floral designs that inspire and delight. Integrity and Trust Honesty and transparency are the foundation of our relationships with customers, suppliers, and employees. We uphold the highest standards of integrity in all our interactions. FAQ What are your delivery options? We offer same-day and next-day delivery options for our floral arrangements. Delivery charges may vary depending on the location. Can I customize my bouquet? Yes, we offer customization options for our bouquets. You can choose the type of flowers, colors, and arrangements to create a personalized bouquet. What if I'm not satisfied with my order? Customer satisfaction is our priority. If you are not satisfied with your order, please contact us immediately, and we will work to resolve the issue. How can I track my order? Once your order is processed and shipped, we will provide you with a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your order on our website. Contact us Have a question or want to learn more about our floral arrangements? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly.
